reviews.review: Love this game. Very thrilling and fun to play with friends

Игра в которой каждое обновление все больше и больше закапывает дбд в могилу. Например, выпустили обновленную систему подбора игр, и из-за неё может быть такое, что у вас в тиме 16-20 ранги, а против вас играет маньяк с 1 рангом, или ты играешь на 3 ранге за выжившего, а у тебя в тиме 20 ранги и ты такой круто -ранг).Еще к примеру могу взять прошлое обновление, когда они изменили хиллбилли, и убили почти все его улучшения, и добавили аутистичную механику перегрева. А так игра хорошая, очень фановая и интересная, но с убитым балансом... СТАВЛЮ 7/10 застрявших демогоргонов в текстуре из 10) + ХОЧУ ДОБАВИТЬ ЧТО ТУТ ОЧЕЕНЬ ПАРАШНЫЕ СЕРВЕРА, ИЗ-ЗА ЭТОГО, КОГДА Я ИГРАЛ ЗА СУРВА, И БЕЖАЛ К ВОРОТАМ, ПОТОМ ЗАШЕЛ В НИХ  И МЕНЯ РЕЗКО ТЕЛЕПОРТИРОВАЛО НАЗАД... АХУЕННО -КАПЛЯ ТУПА ИЗ-ЗА ТУПЫХ СЕРВЕРОВ. (ТАКОЕ ЧАСТО СЛУЧАЕТСЯ)

Despite the hours I have in this game and how much I genuinely do enjoy playing it, unfortunately I cannot recommend it for new players because of how unfriendly it is to beginners. 

The game itself lacks a crucial comprehensive tutorial for newbies and with a skill based matchmaking system that is pretty universally agreed is badly designed, you'll find yourself going into games against players with much more experience and unequipped to deal with it, both due to lack of experience and lack of perks, that are for some reason still on a 3 tier upgrade system even though the game has been released for years and there are a HUGE amount more perks to collect now than on the original release, where the tier system made more sense. I'm sure games like this can leave newer players feeling very down and defeated.

The development team obviously lack passion for their game, or respect for the people who play it; possibly both. Ignoring the very vocal shouts of the community and creators for quality of life changes, in place they continue to make more paid DLC content, adding more killers and perks to learn and making the game less and less beginner friendly every time.

Despite all this, if you have the time to put into learning the game, there are a huge amount of amazing creators that you can learn from or find a mentor of sorts and once you start to get the hang of it, you will have a brilliant time, especially with a good group of friends to play with.

За убийцу, лично мне, играть балдежно, а за выжившего не очень. Игра имеет небольшой онлайн и из-за этого часто попадаешься против задротов - это конечно минус. В принципе игру купить можно, если вам надоели командные игры по типу доты/кс. Хороший плюс играя за мана в том, что ты не зависишь от других людей и полагаешься только на свой скил, ну и на перки... которые надо покупать за реал или оочень долго фармить в игре(

It's a fun game to learn and even more fun to master. Learning process is hard, but it's awesome to see how/when things click and you understand the mechanics. I recommend playing as both killer and the survivor to get a better understanding of this game. 

Fun to play with friends too, but shame it's not as appreciated in the community it seems as it gives a significant gameplay advantage. 

Some players can be considered as "toxic", but remember it's just a game and it's meant to be enjoyed however you want!

Word of advice: Avoid buying perks from already unlocked characters in the store with iridescent shards, as they're not that easy to come by especially later on, unlike the bloodpoints which can be used as an alternative!

Try it out for yourself!
Großartiges Spiel mit einer furchtbaren Community.

It's personally very laggy, and the skill timers are quite impossible to do because of that. There's also a bug where, if you don't leave the little wooden locker in the tutorial, it will glitch and you cannot exit. Other than that, the game itself looks very promising, and I hope to see more of it, and play more of it.

If you want to enjoy this game then you HAVE to play customs with 5 friends. Otherwise it's just survivors teabagging you nonstop or get facecamped/Mori'd. Absolutely cannot recommend outside of customs where you can just not use the bullshit items and can play like someone that wants to have fun. Community is also by far the most toxic that i have ever experienced and I've played League of Legends for 8 years.

This game is weird. It is the same thing over and over again. You spawn in, fix 5 generators and then open the doors and escape. There is nothing else. You play with 3 others and you run away from a killer. Yet somehow every time I play it feels different and still is fun. IDK how! But I have not lost interest in the game whatsoever! I absolutely recommend this game.

Awesome game with plenty of mechanics that keep it interesting and challenging. The developers do a great job providing updates, patches, and DLC. The core survivors and killers is enough to get you started, but the game really begins to open up with the DLC chapters. Unfortunately, they can get pricey for so many chapters and so many characters, as well as the newly introduced Rift (battle pass style progression system).

Fortunately, the DLC is optional and often goes on sale for a reduced price, as does the game. I definitely recommend picking it up the next time it goes on sale (usually $10) and if you enjoy it, get some more characters! Great game with friends. Great game to play as a streamer too.
i cant run this game but it is sick
the DC punishment mechanism (which means u can't research match after 5 min) is the dumbest change I ever seen :)
great addicting game to grind with and without friends

随着杀手强度越来越高，地图越来越复杂，游戏越来越不适合一个萌新生还者去练习戏耍杀手。但是如果你们是车队，游戏会非常有意思，毕竟游戏就是要多人玩才快乐。就算你是孤独传说，生还者和杀手轮着玩也能让你在多种杀手和不一样的生还者技能中得到不一样的游戏体验，从而得到满足。身为一个旧时代的人屠双皇，这游戏竟能满足我的杀戮欲望，又能满足我的抖M属性。是非常不错的。

Идея, баланс, драйв - в этой игре сделан уклон на это. После многих часов в доту и кс, садясь играть в дбд ты сразу ощущаешь теплоту комьюнити, так как в этой игре нет проигравших все пытаются друг другу помочь набить очки. Сурвы помогают маньяку по максимуму получить опыт, маньяк в свою очередь помогает сурвам набрать максимальные очки, а дальше уже дело интереса. Поймать всех? - А почему бы и нет! Спасти союзника хотя ты уже можешь спокойно сбежать? - Да почему бы и нет, один за всех и все за одного, а очки в придачу будут и маньяку и выживающим. Превосходная игра с интереснейшей системой очков. Из незначительных минусов, наверное, долгий поиск катки и частые нерфы персонажей(хоть это и во благо, но терять свою ос жалко). Люблю Легион, хот бабеха с редхейр хд.
bastante entretenido a pesar de los malos jugadores
